author: aldcroft
description: The Kapteyn package provides a very nice tutorial aimed at beginners that introduces the basics of WCS (world coordinate system) transformations.  The examples use the Kapteyn wcs module, but many of the concepts discussed are independent of the specific software.http://www.astro.rug.nl/software/kapteyn/wcstutorial.html
title: WCS tutorial using Kapteyn
